BHC Why do you guys think they havent made any debt payments and only announced 100M earlier this year when they actually paid down the revolving line as well to a total of 158M This IR dept sucks Time to fight back If Paul was waiting to make a bigger pmt it would have been smarter to announce when the stock was 2650 You can announce it now with future pmts over next few months as explained in the press release Feels like no one has their hand on the pulse of this stock price It should be on all their computer screens The silence is deafening It would be better to pay off 25M a week in debt and announce it every Friday
